alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 4:18PM EDT until March 12 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter size hail and damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located 8 miles southeast of Blountstown, and moving east at 40 mph. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Bristol, Telogia, Lake Talquin, Hosford, Hilliardville, Fort Braden, Clio, Silver Lake Rec Area, Woods, Lowry, Wetumpka and Bloxham. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
